name: TeROOTory
description:
It's a game about two tuberous roots, an carrot and a beet

How to play!

Use WASD to move Carroty and E to place an carrot

Use Keyboard Arrows to move Beeth and Ctrl to place a beet

How win the game?

You must have more plants of your kind than the other, the game finishes when there no more grass.

Developed by Guilherme Delmondes and Gustavo André
